column5: Hey Guys,  I got out with Jon Bondy again yesterday and we did some more filming.  This time it's casting for open water muskies on St. Clair using the Bondy Bait!  <iframe width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/4dEFqNINmLA?hd=1" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Love your videos!!!!! Jon knows his stuff.  My buddy got a fat 47" on st. clair casting a buudawg with me last week. I got squat casting - got a few trolling but I hate trolling.
After finally getting one for myself, i always get pumped watching Muskie related vids This was a good one too. Thanks Brandon  Paul

Very cool Brandon it sure is different casting to NOTHING out here on LSC and sure does make ya want to get back to trolling I do need to leave the go to stuff at home one day and do the casting thing all day.
Those St.Clair/Detroit R. muskies have a real unique spot pattern. Cool stuff

great video, sure glad he added "we're allowed to use 2 rods"...for most of the bodies of water in southern ontario this whole leaving a bait over the side of the boat while you continue to cast could get you in a whole heap of trouble.
I'm glad you guys enjoyed it!
Awesome Video. Must be nice getting out with him for a day.
